name: Student
description: Some would say that there's nothing particularly notable about you.  But you've survived, and that's more than most could say right now.

name: Student - Chairman
description: When this disaster happened, you grabbed the best weapon - a chair - and started to fight.  How long will you survive, in this wave of chaos?

name: Student - Medic
description: Before the world ended, you had a kind heart and loved to help other people, both in speaking and healing.  Now that the world has gone to ashes, you need to survive using your skills.

name: Student - Fireman
description: Some teachers would say that you were a bad student.  You always skipped class, and slept when you did not.  But still, you did survived with your thick coat and a modified fire extinguisher.

name: Student - Archer
description: There is nothing better than a bolt pierced through an undead's head.  However, you should also know that they can pierce your head too.

name: Student - Painter
description: You always liked to paint, and it was your dream job to become an artist.  What painting will you draw, in this canvas which is called the world?

name: Student - Bomber
description: You love sweets!  As the world ended, you made your own explosive using snacks and soft drinks.

name: Student - Backattacker
description: You were hell on wheels prior to the apocalypse.  Now the rest of your team is dead, and you probably wouldn't have lived this long if not for your penchant for high-speed violence.  Things are looking grim; how long can you race laps around the undead before you get blocked for good?

name: Student - Swordsman
description: Dammit to hell, an evil wizard brought doom to this world!  You grabbed your trusty gear, and get ready to destroy those unspeakable demons.

name: Student - Swordsman
description: You were a LARPer - an actor with a mix of a comedian.  The major problem is that there is no more LARPing anymore.  In the grim darkness of a near future, there are only zombies.  And some weird creatures.

name: Student - Cheerleader
description: The team that you cheered before had a high chance of winning, and won many games.  Against the new team called undead, that didn't worked.  Now that the team are all dead, guess you have to cheer for yourself.  Or fight.  Or both.

name: Student - Hitman
description: As a baseball player, you were a semi-pro hitter.  Dang, guess you have to hit more than a baseball to survive this game.

name: Student - Ranger
description: Ever since you were a child you loved shooting bows, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of shooting with a bow.  The world ended?  Who cares?  You have your bow and your skills.

name: Student - Singer-Songwriter
description: You wrote songs, and sang them.  Too bad that there are no more people to listen to the pieces that you've made.  At least you could give undeads a piece, whether they want it or not.

name: Student - Untouchable
description: You were a heir to a wealthy company.  Well, tides had turned and not only the company but the world is also doomed.  Could you survive in this cruel world of the dead, just like you did back in the days, against another rich kids?

name: Student - Superstar
description: You were preparing for an idol contest, had the skills, the looks, and the attitudes.  The contest was going to happen tomorrow and this apocalypse canceled it.  Forever.

name: Student - Trapper
description: You had the school lunch lady type of job in school.  The job sucked, plus no one heard your whining about rats, so you tried to take the matters in your hands.  Now that the world has ended, the thing that you now have are some traps which you were going to catch some mice.

name: Student - Shouter
description: As the school hall monitor, you belived in your leadership.  It will make your job easier while leading people, but against zombies...  Guess you need another method.

name: Student - Magician
description: With tricks and magic, you could survive this whole disaster.  Or not.  At least you got some cards to throw at your enemies.
You've always loved frogs and rain!  Too bad both of them are far from safe now.

name: Student - Shooter
description: As a basketball player, it was going to be your first major game, but then the Cataclysm struck.  Thanks to your quick feet, you were among the lucky few to survive and escape from the creatures.

name: Student - Actor
description: By being an actor brought some weird events, such as learning many skills.  You are a jack of all trades type of person, learning every type of skills.

name: Student - Supporting Actor
description: By being an actor brought some weird events, such as learning how to throw.  You are pretty good at throwing, and have some cool stimulants to hide from some unwanted guests.

As you were preparing for your next school play, an outbreak happened and you had to escape.  Too bad you could not perform the show, but at least the show called your life got a new chapter to begin.

name: Student - Spotlight
description: As you were preparing for your next school play, an outbreak happened and you had to escape with a modified spotlight as a weapon.  Too bad you could not perform the show, but at least the show called your life got a new chapter to begin.

name: Student - Operator
description: As you were preparing some advanced tech for your next school play, an outbreak happened and you had to escape with a modified spotlight as a weapon.  Too bad you could not perform the show, but at least the show called your life got a new chapter to begin.

name: Student - Surfer
description: You were on your way to enjoy surfing and the world has ended.

name: Student - Blaster
description: You've always tried to be the lifeguard, and tried to saved lives.  Will your siklls be useful, when the lives you could have saved are all dead?

name: Student - Adebuster
description: You were on your way to give swimmers some nice drinks and the world has ended.

name: Student - Vacancer
description: You were on your way to enjoy some swimming and the world has ended.

name: Student - Boxer
description: You were training for the fight of your life before the Cataclysm struck.  Now you fight just to keep yourself alive.

name: Student - Sprinter
description: You were that kind of sportsman who couldn't get off the track.  You love running, and you enhanced your body to do it even better.  Now there is plenty to run from, but this is your kind of game.

name: Student - Crasher
description: When this disaster happened, you grabbed the best weapon - a desk - and started to fight.  How long will you survive, in this wave of chaos?

name: Student - Striker
description: As a semi-pro scoccer player, you were practicing till SHTF happened.  Guess you do need to run more than a lot in order to survive.

name: Student - Cleaner
description: As a rich kid, you always hated when others litter, mess up a place, or both.  Now that everyone is dead, guess there are more things to clean up.

name: Student - Shutter
description: You always liked to take pictures, whether it was a picture of a human or a landscape.  Guess you got another category in your album, if you do survive this.

name: Student - Hacker
description: You always liked electrical stuff - drones, computers, pc, tablets, and so on.  As SHTF you brought your own army of drones, and started to fight back against the undead.

name: Teacher - Smoker
description: You've been teaching kids for some years of your life, and they've mostly listened to your teachings.  However, the dead won't write out lines for eating you alive.  How did you got some smoke bombs, you do not know.

name: Student - Smasher
description: As a student and a semi-libarian, you always loved books.  Will your knowledge be useful, when the whole world is doomed?

name: Student - Poisoner
description: The school garden was almost your area.  The world has ended, but who cares - you still can make your own garden, much bigger than the one you had before.

name: Student - Lancer
description: As the leader of a marching band, you swung your swagger stick to give your members a good beat.  As there are no bands for you to lead, you could only swing the stick in order to protect yourself.

name: Student - Templar
description: As a trained sword user, you lost your dear friend.  Will there be any hope left, when everything ended, died, and maimed?  Guess you have to swing your weapon to find it out.

name: Student - Pitcher
description: You were always a good pitcher in your baseball team.  As everyone else has falllen, how long will you take those undead bastards 'out?'

name: Student - Tamer
description: You were called in on your day off to feed the animals at the 'school farm' because none of your coworkers showed up for work for one reason or another.

name: Teacher - Cryomancer
description: By the studies that you took back in university, you could make some freeze guns and grenades.  You cannot kill them directly, but these are still better than nothing!

name: Student - Noisemaker
description: All you ever wanted was to make people excited.  Now the damn world had ended.  Wow.  Just wow.

name: Student - Celebrity Trainee
description: You were preparing for an idol contest, had the skills, the looks, everything but the attitudes, although you did believed in yourself.  The contest was going to happen tomorrow and this apocalypse canceled it.  Forever.  Guess you need to believe yourself more longer.

name: Student - Animator
description: You did not lose your hope about drawing comics, even after the apocalypse happened.  Unfortunately, hope does not ensure your life.

name: Student - Splasher
description: As a member of the sea cadet corps, you always liked to go to sea and loved sea-related stuff.  Now, you have to go to sea or aquarium by yourself, without others' help.  Your will and wits that you've learned during training should keep you survive... or not.

name: Student - Outsider
description: You were the 'lone wolf' type of person.  After the apocalypse, that did not changed at all.  It just became worse, since the people around you are now going to eat you up.  Hiding in a box sounds nice, just like the japanese game with lots of cardboard boxes.

name: Student - Partyplanner
description: You love parties!  Unfortunately for you, a big event called the apocalypse ended the world that you lived in.  Guess you have to party in a different way, or else, right?

name: Student - Entertainer
description: You were the queen bee of the school - you always were the Master of Ceremonies, always made the show flow easliy like a river.  Now, you have bigger problems than a guy falling down during a show.

name: Teacher - Maestro
description: You've been teaching kids music for the whole of your life, and they've mostly listened to your teachings.  However, the dead won't stop singing songs for eating you alive.

name: Student - Thrower
description: As a half - rapper and a half - frisbee player, you grabbed the best weapon in your hand - a frisbee - and dived into the apocalypse.  Some tunes in your pocket, weapon in your hand, and now you are ready to go.

name: Student - Sharpshooter
description: Ever since you were a child you loved shooting bows, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of shooting with a bow.  There was a person better than you, and winning that person was the only thing that you've cared about.  The world ended? Who cares? You have your bow, your skills, and the will to win this disaster.  Wait, that competitor should be dead now, right?

name: Student - Skater
description: You were hell on wheels prior to the apocalypse.  Now the rest of your team is dead, and you probably wouldn't have lived this long if not for your penchant for high-speed violence.  Things are looking grim; how long can you race laps around the undead before you get blocked for good?

name: Student - Healer
description: When chaos came, you helped people by healing them.  Unfortunately the undead overwhelmed, and you fled to a school that you were attending before.

name: Student - Commander
description: As you were the leader of an amatuer baseball team, you always led your people to do something; running, practicing, baseball, and cleaning things up.  Since all of your teammates are dead, you wonder how your commanding skills will help you.  At least you got a flare gun from a dead man's hand.

name: Gym Teacher
description: After a career of teaching kids the art of sports they mostly hate, the zombies around you refuse to do laps, even at the blow of your whistle.

name: Teacher
description: You've been teaching kids for the whole of your life, and they've mostly listened to your teachings.  However, the dead won't write out lines for eating you alive.

name: Student - Juvenile
description: You never cared for grown-ups telling you what to do, and that's how you ended up spending most of your days in the principal's office.  Now, not needing grown-ups to tell you what to do is the only reason you're alive.  Man, you really should've played hooky today.

name: Student - Survivalist
description: Your parents were crazy preppers who thought some "Cataclysm" was coming, and insisted on preparing you for it.  Turns out they were right.  You didn't get a chance to thank them.  The only thing you can do for them now is what they always hoped you would do in the dark days ahead: survive.

name: Student - Cyborg
description: Your parents were so obsessed with making sure you aced every test that they had you outfitted with bionics to make you smarter and never forget anything.  And now, you are facing the most dire test yet, and once again you had better succeed, or else.

name: Student - Dodgeball Player
description: You liked to play dodgeball, where failing to dodge the ball meant you were out.  Now failing to dodge threatens your life.  Don't slip up.

name: Student - Science Club Member
description: You were a member of the school science club, and right now you're as upset as you've ever been that the school wouldn't let you play with the really fun chemicals that make things go boom.  At least now no one's around to tell you that you can't.

name: Student - Otaku
description: Late nights with friends watching anime and eating snacks has prepared you for the premier anime convention in the Northeast.  It just had to be the day of the apocalypse.  At least you were ready in case your costume tore.

name: Student - Gunslinger (six shooter)
description: You always liked Wild West related stuff, impressing friends and others with your displays of marksmanship.  But that world has ended, so you took your trusty 6-shooter flintlock and ready to shoot some ruffians with it.

name: Student - Gunslinger (rider)
description: You always liked Wild West related stuff, impressing friends and others with your displays of marksmanship.  But that world has ended, so you took your trusty flintlock pistol and ready to shoot some ruffians with it.

name: Student - Slasher
description: You always liked slasher and zombie movies.  As this event happened, you grab your mask and your weapon - a machete, and got ready to slash those zombies.  Do you like hurting other zombies?  Cause you should.

name: Student - Slasher?
description: Kill.  Rip.  Burn.  Tear.

name: Student - Priest
description: Holy mother of god.  Something - something bad happened, and you are chased by a group of undeads.  You could meditate to a god, but this is another challange that the god gave you to face.

name: Student - Monk
description: Something - something bad happened, and you are chased by a group of undeads.  You could meditate to a god, but this is another challange that the god gave you to face.

name: Student - Airsoft Player
description: People always looked down on your hobby, but you survived due to your training, and they did not.  Time to go another round, which should not end soon.

name: Student - Gangster
description: You always liked the classic Italian gangster movies - suit, tie, and a tommy gun.  As you bought your fedora, the world ended and the zombies got loose.  Well, time to do the hit-and-run thingy.

name: Student - Sleep Victim
description: What the goddam hell!  You were in the middle of a nice sleep when the Cataclysm struck!  You barely managed to escape with a bathrobe.

name: Student - Sniper
description: You always liked to shoot guns.  More likely, you liked to shoot guns accurately, and you were good at it.  While you were playing a round shooting BBs, apocalypse happened and it turned your world 180 degrees.  You are nothing like the sniper from a cool movie, but determined enough to survive in this damn hellhole.

name: Student - Survivor
description: Either due to your skill or sheer luck, you were able to survive this whole disaster untill now.  You do not know what will happen tomorrow, but at least you live to die another day.

name: School Security
description: A school security guard. You don't have any useful skills, other than some basic training for your job.  You do however have your trusty tazer, baton, and pocket knife.

name: Student - Novice Martial Artist
description: You were on your way to the dojo for your first lesson when the world ended.  And you really wanted to learn how to swim, too.

name: Student - Martial Artist
description: 'Drop the martial arts!', they said.  'Learn a skill for the REAL world!', they said.  Well, you're about to show them!  SHOW THEM ALL!

name: Student - Blackbelt
description: As the world ends, you alone stand against the coming darkness with your fists of steel.

You were living the high life, spending your parents money without a care in the world.  You were at one of your usual crazy parties when the guests became hungry for more than your drugs.  You still have a chance to use the last symbol of your luxurious life - your sports car - and get far away.

name: Student - Burglar
description: You thought this would be your lucky break. Does it count as breaking and entering if everyone is undead?

name: Student - Shotgunner (double barrel)
description: Ever since you were a child you loved shooting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of shooting with a shotgun.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty shotgun.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Student - Shotgunner (pump action)
description: Ever since you were a child you loved shooting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of shooting with a shotgun.  Why, if the world ended there's nothing you'd want at your side more than your trusty shotgun.  So when it did, you made sure to bring it along.

name: Student - Pyromaniac
description: You always liked fires.  Well, a little too much to be honest.  Now that the world has ended, there is nobody to stop you from burning.  Let the world BURN!

name: Student - Adventurer
description: You had a dream - a dream to take the risk and go to an unknown place, when you become an adult.  Unfortunately, the dream came true much earlier than you thought.  With a trusty kukri, a whip, and a cowboy hat, you plunge into the unknown.

name: Student - Diver
description: You loved both diving and swimming.  And now, the water became more dangerous than you expected.  You are gonna need a bigger boat.

name: Student - Fencer
description: You were an avid sport fencer, always practicing at local clubs and competing in tournaments.  You were on your way to have a few bouts at the club when the world ended.  Now you're in your most important tournament, the refs are all dead, and none of your opponents follow the rules.

name: Student - Heavy Gunner
description: You were called 'heavy' or 'heavy gunner' in your airsoft group, due to your body size and the guns that you use.  There is no one calling you heavy now, but the game goes on, whether you like it or not.

name: Student - Light Gunner
description: Compared to the 'heavy gunner' guy in your airsoft group, you were the smaller person.  There is no one calling you by that name now, but the game goes on, whether you like it or not.

name: Student - Rider
description: You've always liked riding bikes.  When the end of the world has knocked on your door, you did what you best - running, or riding away, using your bike.  Although you do think that there is no escape, you always try to get away from your doom.

name: Student - Mascot
description: You were the school mascot, before the world ended. At least you have your cute snowman costume on you.

name: Student - Agressor
description: You loved fireworks, and you still love them.  You love it sooo much that you even want to enjoy it with the undead!

name: Student - Agent
description: As a 007 wannabe, you grabbed your gear and got ready for the apocalypse.  You do have some simple tools, but you are not so sure about your skills.

name: Student - Library Nerd
description: They say reading is food for the brain, but those corpses seem to see your brain as food.  In your haste to escape, you grabbed the library's return box, but is there anything in there that might help you?

name: Student - Trooper
description: You've always liked military-related stuff; guns, uniform, helmets, etc.  As you were on your way to a military related club, a story of war changed into a story of survival.

name: Student - Marksman
description: You always liked to shoot guns. More likely, you liked to shoot guns quite accurately, and you were pretty good at it.  While you were playing a round shooting BBs, apocalypse happened and it turned your world 180 degrees.  You are nothing like the sniper from a cool movie, but determined enough to survive in this damn hellhole.

name: Student - Paintball player
description: Ever since you were a child you loved shooting, and you soon took a liking to the challenge of shooting with a paintball.  No full auto in the buildings?  Who cares, the world is doomed anyways.

name: Student - Game Master
description: Trying to herd cats into getting into one place every week has taught you something: it's usually better to cut your losses and trust your gut.  For that reason, when you had two no-shows and the other two tried to eat you, you ditched.  Maybe you can find some new players in the ruins of the world.

name: Student - Bionic Game Master
description: You came into a large fortune, through luck or will, and hosted games for people that most of the world knew on a first-name basis.  You could afford to spoil your players, and so you did.  You invested in bionics to make you smarter, and memorized the entire handbook.  Let's hope that knowledge helps you now.

name: Student - Kitted Survivor
description: At the internet, you saw a sign advertising a discount on survival kits.  You bought one, more for show than for actual use.  Now, it's all you have.

name: Student - Scoundrel
description: Your flexible outlook on the rules, the scuffles you've been in (and avoided) at the school, and your impressive ability to weasel your way out of the consequences of your actions - all these skills have helped ensure your survival.  But how much longer will they hold out?

name: Student - Cheerleader with a chansaw
description: You were not the best cheerleader, but when this whole world end happened, you knew that you were good at using a chainsaw.

name: Teacher - School Nurse
description: As the school nurse, you always helped other students by giving them a bed to rest and an aspirin to lower their headaches.  Guess you need more than some aspirin and a bed to survive <the_cataclysm>.

name: Student - Trencher
description: You were a maniac in WW1 - but never expected a trench warfare to happen right in front of your face.  No officers to hide secrets from you, but you know that you are screwed up.

name: Student - DJ
//: The skull balaclava is an homage of DJ Skully.
description: You were a must-have guy in parties - someone need some good music, and there you were.  While you were enjoying your casual job, the cataclysm happened, you managed to barely escape, and started the last but greatest party ever.  PARTY TIME!

name: Student - Cyborg
description: You always had to have the latest and best gadgets and gizmos, so is it any wonder that you upgraded your flesh along with your smart phone?  Only time will tell if your passion for electronics and your status as a marvel of bionic technology will be enough to ensure your survival after the apocalypse.

name: Student - Wanderer
description: Your school has been demolished and your planet destroyed, but at least you still have your guidebook.

name: Student - Gladiator
description: The day when the world ends came, and you grabbed whatever you could get your hands on - some nets and a forked spear.  Ave Imperator, Morituri te salutant.

name: Student - A/V Club Member
description: You were a member of the school A/V club.  You're sure there's some way you can use your technical skills to help stay alive.  You just haven't figured out how to make an awesome death ray yet.

name: Student - Musician
description: You were just about to hit the stage when the Cataclysm struck.  You weren't able to grab much during the panic, but at least you have your instrument on your back.

name: Student - Band Musician
description: You were just about to hit the stage when the Cataclysm struck.  You weren't able to grab much during the panic, but at least you have your instrument on your back.

name: Student - Musketeer
description: You were on your way to the History exhibition when the end of the world permanently derailed your plans.

name: Student - Barista
description: You used to learn how to make coffee as best as you could, but now you are wondering whether it is worth anymore.

name: Student - Dancer
description: You used to be a dancer before the Cataclysm, and now you use your skills to save your life.

name: Student - Jockey
description: You were born with a silver spoon, and loved riding horses.  Now that you only have the last one left, you aren't quite sure whether your riding skills will save you or not.

name: Student - Pro Diver
description: Underwater was just a mystery to you before - now, it is just a danger.

name: Student - Swimmer
description: The world ended, and you are guessing that you need more than just some swimming skills in order to survive.

name: Student - Maid
description: You were cosplaying as a maid when the end of the world was knocking at your door.  Would be cool if you could stop time and throw some knives against a thief witch, but no.

name: Student - Butler
description: You were cosplaying as a butler when the end of the world was knocking at your door.  Would be cool if you could use some mono filaments as weapons and fight a badass vampire, but no.

name: Student - Bodyguard
description: As a bodyguard wannabe, you grabbed your gear and...  Well, guess you have to protect yourself in this situation.

name: Student - Golfer
description: You decided to get away from school for the day to do a little golfing by yourself.

name: Student - Shocker
description: You studied electronics as your hobby, and when the apocalypse happened, you grabbed your modified gear and started to fight the undead.

name: Student - Bounty hunter
description: The thrill of the hunt… the promise of payment.  Well, you cosplayed as one, but without skills.  At least you do have better gear than others.

name: Student - Sapper
description: You literally grabbed anything and now you are the one who builds things and destroys things.

name: Student - Guerilla
description: Crap hits the fan, you hit the zeds.  Damn, hit and run sounds real good this time.
After you read a couple of ninja-related books, you became obsessed with them and practiced some tools of them.  Guess now is the right time to use those tips, gears, and tricks.  Death to the ninja.

name: Student - Engineer
description: You loved making simple AIs and turrets, like that hard hat wearing Texan from a good old shooter game.  Sentry going up!

name: Student - Fursuit Actor
description: Some made fun of you, others bullied you when you were in a suit.  Now is the time to pay them back.

name: Student - mallninja
description: While they were living their life you studied the blade.  And now that the world is on fire and the zombies are at the gate people have the audacity to come to you for help.  Nevermind, everyone is dead.
